*How to Use AES Encryption*
{{{
// Create an AESEncryptor.
private AESEncryptor fAESEncryptor = new AESEncryptor();

// Encrypt string.
string stringToEncrypt = "Encrypt this!";
string password = "My password";
           
// To encrypt the string data we set a password and the encryption bits (AESBits.BITS128, AESBits.BITS192
    AESBits.BITS256).
string encryptedString = fAESEncryptor.Encrypt(stringToEncrypt , password, AESBits.BITS256);
            
// To decrypt an encrypted string use the AESEncryptor Decrypt method.
// As you can see in the decrypt method the encryption bits and the password are the same we used in the encrypt
    method otherwise decryption fails.
string decrypted = fAESEncryptor.Decrypt(encryptedString , password, AESBits.BITS256);

// Encrypt byte array.
byte [] bytesToEncrypt = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("Encrypt this!");
byte [] encryptedBytes = fAESEncryptor.Encrypt(bytesToEncrypt , password, AESBits.BITS192);
}}}


*How to se TripleDES Encryption*
{{{
// Create a TripleDESEncryptor.
private TripleDESEncryptor fTripleDESEncryptor = new TripleDESEncryptor ();

// Encrypt string.
string stringToEncrypt = "Encrypt this!";
string password = "My password";
           
// To encrypt the string data we set a password.
string encryptedString = fTripleDESEncryptor.Encrypt(stringToEncrypt , password);
            
// To decrypt an encrypted string use the TripleDESEncryptor Decrypt method.
// As you can see in the decrypt method the password is the same we used in the encrypt method otherwise
    decryption fails.
string decrypted = fTripleDESEncryptor.Decrypt(encryptedString , password);

// Encrypt byte array.
byte [] bytesToEncrypt = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("Encrypt this!");
byte [] encryptedBytes = fTripleDESEncryptor .Encrypt(bytesToEncrypt , password);
}}}

*How to use MD5 Encryption*
{{{
// Create an MD5Encryptor.
private MD5Encryptor fMD5Encryptor = new MD5Encryptor ();
            
// Get MD5 from string.
string simpleString = "Hello!";
string md5 = fMD5Encryptor.GetMD5(simpleString);
           
// Get MD5 from byte array.
byte [] bytesArray = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("Hello!");
string md5FromBytes = fMD5Encryptor.GetMD5(bytesArray);
}}}
